Name: Complete Purchase Process for Multiple Products with Checkout
Description: Navigate through the homepage, add multiple products to the cart, and proceed to checkout. Fill in shipping and payment details to complete the order and verify the confirmation page.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Hover over item object
Step 3: Click on link Apple -> Navigate to page 'category page#category/*'
Step 4: Click on button AddToCart
Step 5: Click on label colorStorageOption (512GB)
Step 6: Click on label colorStorageOption (Green)
Step 7: Click on button Buy
Step 8: Click on link iPhone15 -> Navigate to page 'product page#product/*'
Step 9: Click on label colorStorageOption (512GB)
Step 10: Click on label colorStorageOption (Green)
Step 11: Click on button Buy
Step 12: Click on link Cart -> Navigate to page 'cart page#cart'
Step 13: Click on button ProceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout info#checkout/info'
Step 14: Hover over div object
Step 15: Click on input Email
Step 16: Enter input value in input Email2
Step 17: Click on button ContinueToShipping -> Navigate to page 'checkout page#checkout/shipping-address'
Step 18: Hover over div object
Step 19: Click on input FirstName
Step 20: Hover over div object2
Step 21: Enter input value in input FirstName2
Step 22: Click on input LastName
Step 23: Hover over div object3
Step 24: Enter input value in input LastName2
Step 25: Click on input Address
Step 26: Hover over div object4
Step 27: Enter input value in input Address2
Step 28: Click on input ZipCode
Step 29: Hover over div object5
Step 30: Enter input value in input ZipCode2
Step 31: Click on input City
Step 32: Enter input value in input City2
Step 33: Hover over div object6
Step 34: Enter input value in input State
Step 35: Click on input Phone
Step 36: Enter input value in input Phone2
Step 37: Click on button ContinueToPayment -> Navigate to page 'checkout page#checkout/payment'
Step 38: Click on button CompleteOrder -> Navigate to page 'thank you#thank-you/*'
Step 39: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Navigate and Explore Product Categories with Add to Cart Functionality
Description: Navigate through various product categories, select storage options, and add products to the cart. Verify navigation and interactions across categories.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to category/*
Step 2: Click on label storageOptions (512GB)
Step 3: Click on div VariantSelectionPrompt
Step 4: Click on button Close
Step 5: Click on link iPhone15Plus -> Navigate to page 'product page#product/*'
Step 6: Click on label storageOptions (StorageOption256GB)
Step 7: Click on link PhoneCategory -> Navigate to page 'phone category#*/*'
Step 8: Hover over item ProductItem
Step 9: Click on link AppleCategory -> Navigate to page 'category page#category/*'
Step 10: Click on button addToCart (AddToCart)
Step 11: Click on label storageOptions (StorageOption1TB)
Step 12: Click on button Close
Step 13: Click on link SortByTitle
